name: The Northern
raw_snippet: The Northern Gun Sky King The most famous and popular combat vehicle created by the kingdom of Ishpeming (aka "The Northern Gun") is the heavy assault hover vehicle called the Sky King. The vehicle is fast, tough and reliable. Most importantly, it is brimming with weapons. Sky King Model Type: NG-A70 Class: All-Purpose Air Combat Vehicle. Crew: One. M.D.C. by Location: Forward Mounted Nose Laser — 40 Rail Gun and Mini-Missile Launchers (2) — 50 each Rear Jets (2) — 40 each *Main Body — 130 Note: The pilot is shielded and a small and difficult target to hit. Thus, he can only be hit when a character makes a called shot and even then the attacker is - 3 to strike. *Depleting the M. D. C. of the main body will destroy the Sky King. Speed Driving on the ground: Not possible. Flying: The…
